Package farmSim

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
farmSim.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chicken, Cow, Sheep
public class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the superclass for farm Animals objects.
Version:
6/05/2020
Author:
James Harris, Manjeet Panwar
